fields.description: A clear, concise statement of what the task entails.
fields.label: Description

fields.description: The agent responsible for the task, assigned either directly or by the crew's process.

fields.description: A detailed description of what the task's completion looks like.
fields.label: Expected Output

fields.description: The functions or capabilities the agent can utilize to perform the task.

fields.description: Specifies tasks whose outputs are used as context for this task.
fields.label: Context
